intro: Securidaca rufescens, commonly known as red-bark securidaca, is a shrub or small tree native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Leguminosae, also known as the legume or bean family, and is characterized by its compound leaves and pod fruits. Securidaca rufescens is also valued for its medicinal properties in traditional African medicine.
